archimate:BusinessObject.name: DunningNotification
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: "A DunningNotification is a communication or joint activity from the Telecommunication Operator to the party to ask for a PartyPayment or negotiate a PaymentPlan. The relation resulting from a DunningCaseRule might be • either only from the telecommunication operator to the party (Ex: send a SMS) • or in both ways (Ex: a CSR call the party to negotiate a PaymentPlan)."
